languages.text: {n}Медикарий отводит взгляд, силясь понять услышанное. Глубокая, не свойственная молодым людям морщина появляется на его лбу.{/n} "Вы правы — я мог бы сделать многое для родного корабля. Но я не могу отвернуться от знамения, утешить себя компромиссом. Высшие силы желают меня без остатка — так тому и быть".

{n}The medicae officer looks away, struggling to comprehend what he has just heard. A deep furrow appears on his brow — a rare occurrence in someone of his age.{/n} "You are right. There's a lot I could do for my home ship. But I can't just turn my back on the sign I was given and make do with a compromise. The Emperor commands that I dedicate every part of me to His faith, so that's how it must be."
languages.original_text: {n}Медикарий отводит взгляд, силясь понять услышанное. Высшие силы желают меня без остатка — так тому и быть".

There's a lot I could do for my home ship. But I can't turn my back on the sign I was given and make do with a compromise. The higher powers want every part of me dedicated to them; so that's what must be."

languages.text: {n}L'officier de medicae détourne le regard, comme s'il avait du mal à comprendre ce que vous venez de lui dire. Une ride profonde creuse son front, telle que l'on en voit rarement chez quelqu'un d'aussi jeune.{/n} « Vous avez raison. Il ne fait aucun doute que je pourrais me rendre utile à bord de mon vaisseau, mais on m'a envoyé un signe que je ne peux pas me contenter d'ignorer. Si l'Empereur m'ordonne de vouer chaque aspect de ma vie à Sa foi, un compromis ne saurait suffire. »
languages.original_text: {n}The medicae officer looks away, struggling to comprehend what he has just heard. A deep furrow appears on his brow — a rare occurrence in someone of his age.{/n} "You are right. There's a lot I could do for my home ship. But I can't just turn my back on the sign I was given and make do with a compromise. The Emperor commands that I dedicate every part of me to His faith, so that's how it must be."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'officier de medicae détourne le regard, comme s'il avait du mal à comprendre ce que vous venez de lui dire. Une ride profonde creuse son front, telle que l'on en voit rarement chez quelqu'un d'aussi jeune.{/n} « Vous avez raison. Il ne fait aucun doute que je pourrais me rendre utile à bord de mon vaisseau, mais on m'a envoyé un signe que je ne peux pas me contenter d'ignorer. Si l'Empereur m'ordonne de vouer chaque aspect de ma vie à Sa foi, un compromis ne saurait suffire. »

languages.text: {n}El oficial de medicae aparta la mirada, esforzándose por comprender lo que acaba de oír. Un profundo surco aparece en su entrecejo, algo poco habitual en una persona de su edad.{/n} «Es cierto. Hay mucho por hacer en la nave. Pero no puedo dar la espalda a la señal que se me ha enviado y conformarme con una solución de compromiso. El Emperador ha ordenado que dedique cada parte de mi ser a Su fe, por tanto así ha de ser».
languages.original_text: {n}The medicae officer looks away, struggling to comprehend what he has just heard. A deep furrow appears on his brow — a rare occurrence in someone of his age.{/n} "You are right. There's a lot I could do for my home ship. But I can't just turn my back on the sign I was given and make do with a compromise. The Emperor commands that I dedicate every part of me to His faith, so that's how it must be."

Un profundo surco aparece en su entrecejo, algo poco habitual en una persona de su edad.{/n} «Es cierto. Hay mucho por hacer en la nave. Pero no puedo dar la espalda a la señal que se me ha enviado y conformarme con una solución de compromiso. El Emperador ha ordenado que dedique cada parte de mi ser a Su fe, por tanto así ha de ser».

languages.text: {n}马吕斯移开了视线，努力想要理解他刚刚听到的话。他的额头上出现了一条深深的皱纹，这在他这个年纪的人身上很少见。{/n}“您说得对，我确实可以为这艘船做出很多贡献。然而，我不能就这么妥协，轻易背弃我得到的启示。帝皇命令我把全部人生奉献给祂的信仰，因此我也必须这么做。”
languages.original_text: {n}The medicae officer looks away, struggling to comprehend what he has just heard. A deep furrow appears on his brow — a rare occurrence in someone of his age.{/n} "You are right. There's a lot I could do for my home ship. But I can't just turn my back on the sign I was given and make do with a compromise. The Emperor commands that I dedicate every part of me to His faith, so that's how it must be."

traits.locale_text: {n}马吕斯移开了视线，努力想要理解他刚刚听到的话。他的额头上出现了一条深深的皱纹，这在他这个年纪的人身上很少见。{/n}“您说得对，我确实可以为这艘船做出很多贡献。然而，我不能就这么妥协，轻易背弃我得到的启示。帝皇命令我把全部人生奉献给祂的信仰，因此我也必须这么做。”

languages.text: {n} メディケア士官は目をそらした。たった今聞いたことが理解できないようだ。眉間に深いしわが寄っている。彼の年齢の人には、珍しいことだ。{/n} 「おっしゃるとおりです。母艦のためにできることはたくさんあります。しかし、与えられた印に背を向け、妥協でやり過ごすわけにはいかない。皇帝は、私の全てを捧げるよう命じておられます」
languages.original_text: {n}The medicae officer looks away, struggling to comprehend what he has just heard. A deep furrow appears on his brow — a rare occurrence in someone of his age.{/n} "You are right. There's a lot I could do for my home ship. But I can't just turn my back on the sign I was given and make do with a compromise. The Emperor commands that I dedicate every part of me to His faith, so that's how it must be."

traits.locale_text: {n} メディケア士官は目をそらした。たった今聞いたことが理解できないようだ。眉間に深いしわが寄っている。彼の年齢の人には、珍しいことだ。{/n} 「おっしゃるとおりです。母艦のためにできることはたくさんあります。しかし、与えられた印に背を向け、妥協でやり過ごすわけにはいかない。皇帝は、私の全てを捧げるよう命じておられます」

languages.text: {n}Der Medicae-Offizier blickt weg. Er hat Mühe, deine Worte zu verarbeiten. Tiefe Furchen erscheinen auf seiner Stirn, höchst ungewöhnlich für jemanden in seinem Alter.{/n} "Ihr habt recht. Ich könnte viel für mein Heimatschiff tun. Doch ich kann das Zeichen, das mir gegeben würde, nicht einfach ignorieren, und mich mit einem Kompromiss begnügen. Der Imperator verlangt, dass ich mich gänzlich seinem Glauben verschreibe, also muss es so sein."
languages.original_text: {n}The medicae officer looks away, struggling to comprehend what he has just heard. A deep furrow appears on his brow — a rare occurrence in someone of his age.{/n} "You are right. There's a lot I could do for my home ship. But I can't just turn my back on the sign I was given and make do with a compromise. The Emperor commands that I dedicate every part of me to His faith, so that's how it must be."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Medicae-Offizier blickt weg. Er hat Mühe, deine Worte zu verarbeiten. Tiefe Furchen erscheinen auf seiner Stirn, höchst ungewöhnlich für jemanden in seinem Alter.{/n} "Ihr habt recht. Ich könnte viel für mein Heimatschiff tun. Doch ich kann das Zeichen, das mir gegeben würde, nicht einfach ignorieren, und mich mit einem Kompromiss begnügen. Der Imperator verlangt, dass ich mich gänzlich seinem Glauben verschreibe, also muss es so sein."

languages.text: {n}Sıhhiye subayı duyduğu şeyleri algılamakta zorluk çeker bir hâlde bakışlarını çeviriyor. Kaşlarının üzerinde derin bir oyuk oluşuyor. Onun yaşında birinde nadir görülen bir durum.{/n} "Haklısınız. Yuvam olan gemide yapabileceğim çok fazla şey var. Ancak baha bahşedilen işarete sırtımı çevirip taviz veremem. İmparator bana her bir zerremi O'nun inancına adamamı emrediyor, dolayısıyla olması gereken de bu."
languages.original_text: {n}The medicae officer looks away, struggling to comprehend what he has just heard. A deep furrow appears on his brow — a rare occurrence in someone of his age.{/n} "You are right. There's a lot I could do for my home ship. But I can't just turn my back on the sign I was given and make do with a compromise. The Emperor commands that I dedicate every part of me to His faith, so that's how it must be."
